name: Don't Be Late (BottleKAP)
description:
Controls: 

A - Speed up

D - Slow down

W - Turn car up

S - Turn car down

Escape - Pause

Don't Be Late is a race against time for you to make it home to the surprise party for you friend.  You are late to the surprise and are speeding through the city! Watch out for other cars, spikes, oil spills which will slow you down, and cops that are trying to catch you for speeding! Most importantly keep an eye on the TIME and your fuel tank.
